attributes.action: Increase police and decrease paperwork so they spend more time on the street instead of at a desk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Give back the good people their streets and safety, stop protecting criminals with human rights they do not think of other peoples rights when they are commiting crime, start protecting the people who should be protected.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
